Text:
The CPS3 roms are also available at:
http://www.superroms.co.uk/cps3.htm

Thanks for uploading, however it's totaly unnecessary to put everything in one single zip-file, it just makes it harder for everyone. For example I now have no idea if this torrent contains the CHD-files or not, becasue there is no file list.
in the rom directory there's a file garou.zip (about 70meg). does not show up. how do i run this? thanks a million
